attributes.action: Give a guarantee that if road charging comes into force, they wiil not use the technology to charge for parking at our place of work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Like many millions of motorists iam not happy with the spy in my car debate, but what if they start charging for parking at our place of work and when we go shopping, this system does not just work when your vehicle is on the move, and this government have stated in the past about charging for parking at your place of work
